meanings.sent1: She backtracked to find her lost keys.
meanings.sent2: He backtracked along the trail to the starting point.
meanings.sent3: The detective backtracked to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: She backtracked through her memories to remember the details.
meanings.sent5: The hiker backtracked to avoid getting lost in the forest.

meanings.definition: To reverse a previous decision or course of action.
meanings.sent1: They backtracked on their plan to go to the beach.
meanings.sent2: The company backtracked on their new policy.
meanings.sent3: The politician backtracked on his promise to lower taxes.
meanings.sent4: She backtracked on her words, causing confusion.
meanings.sent5: The team backtracked on their strategy after realizing the mistake.
